name: Production Report (Process Wise)
query:
select 
    	mr_item.date as "Date:Date:100",
	mr_item.job_order_id as "Job Order No:Data:120",
	mr_item.employee_name as "Employee:Link/Employee:100",
	mr_item.machine_no as "Machine:Link/Machine:100",
	case when 1=1
	then (select sum(job_allocated) )
	end as Welding,
	case when 1=1
	then (select sum(completed_job) )
	end as Completed,
	case when 1=1
	then (select sum(rejected_qty) )
	end as Rejected
	
	from
	`tabJob Card` mr, `tabJob Order Detail` mr_item
